home.showcasePlaceholderTeaser2:
Profecia Cultural successfully delivered the 2nd edition of Samba Em Rodas (Oct 22–26), connecting the territories of Tobias Barreto, Aracaju, Salvador, and São Paulo.

The project promoted workshops, shared experiences, and samba circles, creating an exchange between the wisdom of the masters and the sharpness of the youth. With a focus on terreiro communities, the event celebrated ancestral roots and the diversity of samba culture in Sergipe.
home.showcasePlaceholderTeaser3:
As part of the program, Tiganá Macedo, Alfredo, and Geraldo Campos brought Tiganá’s artistic project to Colégio Estadual Professora Maria Lucilene (Tobias Barreto) and to UFS (São Cristóvão).

The action combined vinyl listening sessions with percussion workshops, connecting the history of music to hands-on instrumental practice. In a circle, students and musicians exchanged knowledge, reaffirming the transformative power of samba.

Partner in Tobias Barreto: Cultural Collective “Tobias, sou Eu!”.
home.atuacaoSubtitle: Three pillars to deliver culture with quality, responsibility, and structure.
home.atuacaoPillar1Desc: Shows, sambas, and cultural gatherings with curation, quality, and audience experience.
home.atuacaoPillar2Desc: Workshops, schools, and university: popular culture as knowledge and transformation.
home.atuacaoPillar3Desc: Team, setup, and organization: technical capacity for events that demand logistics.
